title: Senior GenAI Engineer(W2/1099) Remote
description:
Senior GenAI Engineer(W2/1099) Remote

Responsibilities:
• Design and develop prototypes, PoCs, and MVPs leveraging advanced AI/GenAI technologies.
• Build and fine-tune multi-modal AI models for various applications.
• Work with Hugging Face, Langchain, and OpenAI API to develop intelligent solutions.
• Implement and optimize deep learning models using TensorFlow, Keras, and PyTorch.
• Deploy AI solutions on cloud platforms such as Google Model Garden, Amazon Bedrock, and Nvidia Nim.
• Research and integrate intelligent agent-based tools and multi-modal AI frameworks.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to bring AI-driven solutions to production.

Requirements:

Strong AI/ML Expertise Deep understanding of machine learning, deep learning, and AI principles.
Proficiency in Python Experience with AI/ML libraries and frameworks like Hugging Face, Langchain, OpenAI API, TensorFlow, Keras, and PyTorch.
Cloud Computing Experience Hands-on experience with Google Model Garden, Amazon Bedrock, and Nvidia Nim.
Multi-Modal AI Knowledge Experience working with text, image, and speech-based AI models.
Innovative Mindset Self-driven, problem-solver with a passion for exploring next-gen AI applications.
Collaboration & Communication Ability to work in a fast-paced, team-oriented environment.
